contexts.context: When the Lady Genevrah was kidnapped from her <mark>estate</mark> and held for ransom, her mother sent word out that...
...back at the old woman's court, he discovered that the <mark>estate</mark> that he would be inheriting was utterly dissolute by decades of...
...the same plan, except with less decoration. Hlaalu plantation <mark>estates</mark> resemble Temple compounds, with walled precincts enclosing outbuildings for craftsmen...
